text:
RELIGION

Ramakrishna Math: Discourse on ‘Mahabharatham’ by A. Ganesan, 5.45 p.m., Aarathi, Reserve Line, New Natham Road, 6.30 p.m.

Gita Bhavanam: 68{+t}{+h}anniversary, 45-day yagna, Kamarajar Salai, 7.30 a.m.

Paneeru Thirumurai Mandram: Tirupugazh Sindanai Vattam by N.S. Sundararaman, Sri Dhandayuthapani Swami Temple, Iravathanallur, 5 p.m.

Young Men’s Brahmins’ Association: Sri Vishnu Sahasranama Parayanam and puja, No. 21 Sambandamoorthy Street, 6 p.m.

Sri Madanagopalaswami Temple: Discourse on Sri Valmiki Ramayanam by Sri U.Ve. Ananthapadmanabachariar Swami, West Masi Street, 6.30 p.m.

Sreemath Bhagavath Geetha Siravana Samajam: 85{+t}{+h}year Sreemath Gita siravana, Gita upanyasam, Govinda Dasa Seva Samajam, Mahal 6{+t}{+h}Street, 6 p.m.

Tirupavai Tiruvembavai Isaipalli: Devotional songs 6 a.m., Paavai songs and devotional songs, Adi Street 6 p.m.

Gita Natanagopala Nayaki Mandir: 173{+r}{+d}jayanthi celebrations, No. 3 Mariamman Teppakulam West Street, 6 p.m.

Thiruvalluvar Mandram: Discourse by R. Umarani on ‘Sundarar Tirupaatu,’ Sakti Velammal Nagar, S.S. Colony, 5 p.m.

CULTURE

Ragapriya Chamber Music Club: Flute by Ajith Ranganathan, Hotel Fortune Pandiyan, 6 p.m.

International Sivananda Yoga Vedanta Centre: Yoga and meditation classes, 444 KK Nagar East Ninth Street, 6 a.m., 6.30 p.m., 10 a.m. and 4 p.m. (for women).

Prajapita Brahma Kumaris Ishwariya Vishwa Vidyalaya: Free rajayoga meditation classes, 36 Meenakshi Nagar, P and T Nagar, 40 Sambandamoorthy Street, 47 B CMR Road and 357 Anna Nagar, 6.30 a.m. and 5.30 p.m.

Yoga Research Centre: Yoga training by S. Yoganand, Department of Philosophy, Madura College, 6.30 a.m.

Bhumi Art Centre: Free winter camp for yoga, Bharati Ula Road, 10 a.m.

GENERAL

Seed Plan Society: 16{+t}{+h}annual day celebration, art exhibition and award ceremony, Additional Collector Rohini Ramdas, Assistant Commissioner of Police B. Saktivel speak, Gandhi Museum, 4 p.m.

Madurai Seed: 17{+t}{+h}anniversary celebration, New Year, New Thoughts, New Actions by Prof. Evangelin Manoharan of American College, Kanavugal Arangam, Karumbalai, 6.30 p.m.

Vidiyal: New Year celebration, Rathinapuram, 9 a.m.

Meenavar Urimai Kootamaippu: State-level consultation on ‘Problems of Tamil Nadu fisher people and ways forward,’ Tyagu, guest speaker, St. Xavier’s Community Hall, No. 69 Old Kuyavarpalayam, near St. Joseph’s School, 10 a.m.

Tamil Nadu Kungfu Association: Free camp for Kungfu, all age group, behind A.R. Hospital, KK Nagar, 10 a.m.

Jan Seva Coop Thrift Sangam: Inauguration of Madurai branch, M.A. Yasin Mohammed presides, 214 Kasim Building, East Veli Street, 10 a.m.

Alcoholics Anonymous: Meeting, Quality Care Hospital, Ellis Nagar 7 p.m., Kalsian Home, Koodal Nagar, 7 p.m.

SPORTS

Saksham: Third State-level chess competition for visually challenged persons, second day, Swami Vivekananda Vidya Mandir School, 10 a.m., prize distribution, 4 p.m.
title: madurai today
